resources.string:
- The size of the maze will be variable depending on the difficulty level.
 - The score can't be negative under any circumstances (0 is the lowest score).
 - Every time the player reaches the exit, he gains 300 points, and if he takes the shortest path, he gets 200 points extra.
 - For every word collected, the player gets additional points based on the length of the word. You can't collect the same word twice.
 - You can't show the shortest path unless you have at least 200 points.
 - If the player goes back to the same cell he was in the previous move, he gets -5 (not applicable if score=0).
 - Depending on the difficulty level, there is a number of moves allowed for the player. If he surpasses it, he will get -10 for each move (not applicable if score=0).
- When the player reaches the exit, he wins and goes to the next round.

- If the time is over, the player will lose 300 points and go back to round 1.\n - If the player reaches the exit without collecting at least 2 words, he will be penalized 100 points and will start again in the same round.
- Same rules as the medium level.\n - If the player collides with an obstacle, his position will reset randomly.
